name: Derby Day Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Amy
summary: A soft, buttery cookie with a taste reminiscent of a certain famous Derby Day pie. Lots of pecans and chocolate chips!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda and salt with a fork
Cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the bourbon
Stir in the flour mixture just until blended
Fold in pecans and chocolate chips
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are lightly browned, about 10 minutes
Cool on the cookie sheet for a minute, then remove to wire racks to cool completely
